front: What is the air-speed velocity of an unladen swallow?

fullText: He who is valiant and pure of spirit may find the holy grail in the Castle of Aaauuuggghhh...
She's beautiful, she's rich, she's got huge... tracts of land.
Oh, what sad times are these when passing ruffians can say Ni at will to old ladies.
